about_the_game:
Polish up your SILVER EMBLEM and reflect your appropriate status as a heavyweight Founder with the SILVER PACK. This pack is designed for those Founders who want to push their creative style while maintaining the classic look of refined elegance. Included is the Silver Founder Emblem that is displayed on your Kill Card when tallying kills and completing notable in-game accomplishments, the FUTURE release of the Project Genesis Remastered Original Soundtrack, and the Founders Pack Color Palette.
Important note: The contents of this Pack are cosmetic only.

Items in the Silver Founders Pack include:

  • Silver Founder Emblem
  • Founders Pack Color Palette
  • Remastered OST (future release)

*If you're already an owner of this pack and don't see your items in-game, please re-link Steam to your account profile on and login again into the game to receive your items. Contact us with any further issues.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7870 equivalent DX11 GPU
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: Push your creative style to the next level with the Silver Founders Pack and show your support for Project Genesis as a Founder!
